article_title: Six hours at hands of Hamas - new accounts reveal how Israeli base fell on 7 October
sentence: The  Nahal  Oz  base  was  overrun  by  Hamas  gunmen  on  the  morning  of  7  October  and  more  than  60  Israeli  soldiers  are  reported  to  have  been  killed  -  with  others  taken  hostage.

article_title: Six hours at hands of Hamas - new accounts reveal how Israeli base fell on 7 October
sentence: Israel’s  military  is  yet  to  publish  its  official  inquiry  into  what  happened  there  that  day,  but  it  has  already  briefed  relatives  of  those  killed  there,  and  some  have  shared  those  details  with  the  BBC.

sentence: In  an  attempt  to  further  piece  together  events,  we  have  also  spoken  to  survivors,  seen  messages  from  those  who  died,  and  listened  to  voice  recordings  reporting  the  attack  as  it  happened,  helping  to  build  a  picture  of  the  speed  and  ferocity  of  the  invasion.
